snippet: Mr. Cady was best known for playing Sam Drucker on the popular 1960s sitcoms “Green Acres” and “Petticoat Junction.”
abstract: Frank Cady, a character actor best known for playing the down-home shopkeeper Sam Drucker on the popular 1960s sitcoms Petticoat Junction and Green Acres, dies at age 96.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Cady was best known for playing Sam Drucker on the popular 1960s sitcoms “Green Acres” and “Petticoat Junction.”

headline.seo: Frank Cady, Actor on ‘Green Acres,’ Dies at 96
headline.main: Frank Cady, Kept Store on ‘Green Acres,’ Dies at 96
headline.print_headline: Frank Cady, 96; Kept Store on ‘Green Acres’
